Project.Brief history of your project and organi: The Weather Company is the world's leading provider of highly accurate weather forecasting, data, and insights, powering trusted consumer experiences like The Weather Channel and weather.com while delivering scalable solutions to businesses across industries such as aviation, media, and advertising.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The GRAF Reforecast dataset from The Weather Company is publicly available on AWS S3 in the us-west-2 region at s3://twc-graf-reforecast, allowing anyone to explore and access it without an AWS account using the command: aws s3 ls --no-sign-request s3://twc-graf-reforecast/.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
1.As a data preparer, I would acquire the GRAF Reforecast Zarr dataset from its public AWS S3 bucket using AWS CLI , validate file integrity with checksums, and optionally subset or add consolidated metadata with xarray and zarr libraries.
2.The data would then be packaged into optimized CAR files (1–32 GiB pieces) using go-car tooling  to generate CommP and Piece CIDs.
3.Finally, I would make verified Filecoin storage deals with multiple providers via boost
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, South America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Shipping hard drives, HTTP or FTP server
